news_header: Geoff Payne visits tributes for his son Liam outside the hotel where he died.
news_text: Geoff Payne, the father of former One Direction member Liam Payne, visited the tributes left by fans outside the hotel in Buenos Aires where Liam died at age 31 after falling from a balcony. He read letters and messages from fans and expressed gratitude for their tributes. Fans formed a barrier to protect him from paparazzi. The text also briefly mentions Dame Maggie Smith's passing, a controversial British TV show winning awards, and various entertainment news including a potential One Direction reunion and police reports regarding BBC presenter Huw Edwards.
